entries.name: RCS Thruster Block
entries.description: Standard attitude control thrusters. Reliable and responsive.

entries.name: Methalox Main Drive
entries.description: Workhorse chemical engine for high-G maneuvers.

entries.name: Metallic Hydrogen Drive
entries.description: Releases the stored energy of metastable hydrogen. Incredible performance for a chemical rocket, bordering on nuclear efficiency.

entries.name: NTR (Solid Core)
entries.description: Fission reactor heating propellant. The standard for interplanetary liners.

entries.name: NTR (Gas Core 'Lightbulb')
entries.description: Advanced open-cycle design running at extreme temperatures for double the efficiency of solid cores.

entries.name: Orion Pulse Drive
entries.description: Detonates nuclear charges behind a pusher plate. Brutal lifting power.

entries.name: Gridded Ion Thruster Array
entries.description: Uses electrostatic fields to accelerate ions. Ultra-high efficiency but agonizingly low thrust.

entries.name: VASIMR Plasma Drive
entries.description: Variable Specific Impulse Magnetoplasma Rocket. Can trade efficiency for thrust. Runs on cheaper Argon.

entries.name: Epstein Fusion Drive
entries.description: High-energy magnetic coil acceleration. Allows continuous 1G burns.

entries.name: Antimatter Beam Core
entries.description: Direct 1:1 conversion of mass to energy. Relativistic exhaust.

entries.name: Alcubierre Warp Ring
entries.description: Compresses space to allow FTL travel. Requires exotic matter.
